DOC.brief_summary: Docetaxel pemetrexed validate previously treat advanced non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) ; however , tolerability concern docetaxel ( tri-weekly 75 mg/m2 schedule ) . The investigator conduct study compare efficacy toxicity weekly low-dose docetaxel versus tri-weekly pemetrexed previously treat advanced NSCLC .
DOC.brief_title: Low Dose Weekly Docetaxel Versus Pemetrexed Previously Treated Advanced Non-Small-Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: We follow schedule weekly low dose docetaxel ( 30 mg/m2 day 1 8 every 3 week ; 60 mg/m2 accumulate dose cycle ) hospital effort achieve good tolerability . We therefore perform exploratory study , statistical analysis , investigate efficacy toxicity low dose docetaxel schedule compare pemetrexed patient NSCLC fail previous chemotherapy .
